targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and
    r._field == "load_avg_1m" and
    r.host =~ /^$hostname$/
  )
  |> yield(name: "load_avg_1m")

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and
    r._field == "load_avg_5m" and
    r.host =~ /^$hostname$/
  )
  |> yield(name: "load_avg_5m")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

    r.host =~ /^$hostname$/

  |> yield(name: "load_avg_15m")

panels.title: Memory Used & Free in MB for $hostname

targets.query:
from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and
    r._field == "memory_percent" and
    r.host =~ /^$hostname$/
  )
  |> yield(name: "memory_free_mb")

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and
    r._field == "network_packets_recv" and
    r.host =~ /^$hostname$/
  )
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "network_packets_recv_per_sec")

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and
    r._field == "network_packets_sent" and
    r.host =~ /^$hostname$/
  )
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * -1.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "network_packets_sent_per_sec_inverted")

import "math"

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and
    r._field == "network_bytes_sent" and
    r.host =~ /^$hostname$/
  )
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 1048576.0 * -1.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "network_bytes_sent_MB_per_sec")

import "math"

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and
    r._field == "network_bytes_recv" and
    r.host =~ /^$hostname$/
  )
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 1048576.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "network_bytes_recv_MB_per_sec")

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and
    r.host =~ /^$hostname$/ and
    r._field == "disk_usage_percent"
  )
  |> yield(name: "disk_usage_percent")

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and
    r.host =~ /^$hostname$/ and
    r._field == "disk_used_gb"
  )
  |> yield(name: "disk_used_gb")

import "math"

from(bucket: "monitoring")

    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and

  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 1048576.0 * -1.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "disk_read_mb_per_s")

import "math"

from(bucket: "monitoring")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and

    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and
    r.host =~ /^$hostname$/ and

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "system_metrics" and

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "monitoring",
  tag: "host",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "system_metrics",
  start: -30d
)
list.name: hostname

query.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "monitoring",
  tag: "host",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "system_metrics",
  start: -30d
)

title: Virtual Elephant / Home Lab / Linux Hosts
